text: Herminium ophioglossoides is a species of plant in the family Orchidaceae. It is endemic to China, known from the provinces of Sichuan and Yunnan.Flora of China v 25 p 120, 长瓣角 chang ban jiao pan lan, Herminium ophioglossoides Schlechter, Notes Roy. Bot. Gard. Edinburgh. 5: 96. 1912. == Sources == * China Plant Specialist Group 2004. Herminium ophioglossoides. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. Category:Endemic orchids of China ophioglossoides Category:Flora of Yunnan Category:Flora of Sichuan Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Plants described in 1912 Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Herminium ophioglossoides
